actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of the Air Force from entering into an agreement that would provide for or permit the joint use of Homestead Air Reserve Base, Homestead, Florida, by the Air Force and civil aircraft.
short_title: Protecting Critical Ecosystems and Military Readiness in Florida Act of 2023

summary.text:
Protecting Critical Ecosystems and Military Readiness in Florida Act of 2023

This bill prohibits the Department of the Air Force from entering into an agreement that would provide for or permit the joint use of Homestead Air Reserve Base in Homestead, Florida, by the Air Force and civil aircraft.

titles.title: Protecting Critical Ecosystems and Military Readiness in Florida Act of 2023
